title: Mega Millions Number Patterns: Frequency Analysis From 2,474 Draws
description: Explore Mega Millions statistical trends, hot/cold numbers, and pair frequency data from our comprehensive 2,474-draw analysis database.
content:
Understanding Mega Millions Through Data Analysis

Lottery enthusiasts looking to understand number patterns in Mega Millions draws can benefit from analyzing historical frequency data. Our database of 2,474 Mega Millions draws reveals fascinating trends that help players understand which numbers appear most frequently and which remain elusive. This statistical analysis provides insights into the game's distribution patterns without making claims about future outcomes.

Hot Numbers Dominating Recent Draws

Our frequency analysis of the last 100 Mega Millions draws shows clear patterns in number selection. The data reveals that number 42 has appeared 14 times, making it the most frequently drawn number in this sample period. Following closely behind, numbers 11, 10, 17, and 18 each appeared 12 times, while 27, 31, 40, 49, and 56 each surfaced 11 times.

This concentration of appearances among certain numbers creates an interesting pattern worth tracking. Players often study these frequency trends to understand which numbers the lottery machine tends to select more regularly.

Cold Numbers: The Least Frequent Appearances

Conversely, our analysis identified numbers that have appeared less frequently over the same 100-draw period:

  • Number 51 appeared only 2 times
  • Numbers 3, 53, 61, and 67 each appeared 3 times
  • Numbers 5, 7, 20, 26, and 35 each appeared 4 times

These cold numbers represent the opposite end of the frequency spectrum. Understanding which numbers appear less frequently can inform analytical approaches to number selection, though random distribution means past performance doesn't influence future draws.

Overdue Numbers: Extended Absence Patterns

Perhaps the most striking trend in our dataset involves numbers that haven't appeared for extended periods. The Mega Millions draw analysis reveals some remarkable gaps:

  1. Number 71 – absent for 888 consecutive draws
  2. Number 72 – absent for 879 draws
  3. Number 75 – absent for 873 draws
  4. Number 74 – absent for 872 draws
  5. Number 73 – absent for 866 draws

These extended absences are notable because they represent the upper range of the Mega Millions number pool (1-75). More moderate overdue numbers include #28 (63 draws overdue) and #29 (54 draws overdue), which may be more statistically significant for trend analysis.

Number Pairing Frequency Trends

Beyond individual number analysis, our statistical research examined which number pairs appear together most frequently across 200 recent draws. The data shows:

  • [22-42] appears 6 times – the most frequent pair combination
  • [43-52] appears 6 times
  • [19-31] appears 6 times
  • [56-66] appears 5 times
  • [31-56] appears 5 times

These pairing patterns suggest that certain number combinations emerge together more regularly than random chance alone might suggest, making them interesting subjects for statistical observation.

Recent Draw Activity

The most recent Mega Millions draw (February 6, 2026) produced: 13, 21, 25, 52, 62 + MB 19. Notably, this draw included number 62, which falls into the mid-range frequency category, and number 25, which appeared in the previous draw on February 3rd alongside numbers 5, 11, and 22.

Key Takeaways From Statistical Analysis

Our comprehensive analysis of nearly 2,500 Mega Millions draws reveals consistent patterns in number frequency, spacing, and pairing combinations. While number 42 dominates recent frequency data, cold numbers like 51 and overdue numbers in the 70s range demonstrate the mathematical spread of outcomes over extended play periods.

Important Disclaimer: Lottery drawings are random events, and historical frequency patterns have no influence on future outcomes. This analysis is presented purely for entertainment purposes and statistical observation. No number, pattern, or trend analysis can predict future lottery results or guarantee any outcome. Always play responsibly and within your means.
